name: EU Meme Control
description:
EU Meme Control is a Simulation Game inspired by Papers Please based on the current debate about improved copyright inside the EU. 

Despite numerous petitions and demonstrations in various european countries, an Upload Filter to improve Copyright infriction was passed. To Upload Memes you now need to provide one or more certificates and other information. You play as an Inspector who checks the authencity of these Certificates .

Game is in early stage of devolopment.
